p: Chan and Johansson [ 12] proposed a lognormal distribution for the length of the extrinsic incubation period with the scale parameter a function of temperature, e 2.9âˆ’0.08 T , and the shape parameter a constant, 4.9. Given their comprehensive treatment of data from a collection of 38 studies, we adopted this best-fit lognormal distribution in our analysis ( Fig 1, EIP).
